title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin discusses the thrilling walk off homerun by the Dodgers to advance into the playoffs and what makes this team special. He explains the difference in today’s age of sports and the aggressive nature that makes it better than past eras. He also makes a surprising defense of Browns QB Baker Mayfield. Plus, former NFL TE and Fox Sports NFL analyst Greg Olsen joins the show to preview Rams v Seahawks and if the Cowboys are a real contender this season.  

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
